document.full_text: 'divine rivalry,' at hartford stage, stylishly recreates a tale of dueling murals, pitting leonardo da vinci against michelangelo.
document.title: theater review | connecticut: two artistic giants, and the man who manipulated them
lines_and_colors: 'divine rivalry,' at hartford stage, stylishly recreates a tale of dueling murals, pitting leonardo da vinci against michelangelo.
